body: KOSH-Ruth, 87, of Key Biscayne, FL, passed away October 5, 1997. Ruth had made her home in South Florida for the past 21 years coming from NYC. Ruth was born in New York City and raised in the Seagate Section of Brooklyn. She attended Hunter College. She, with her late husband David of 64 years was his helpmate with his activities at Temple Beth
title: Paid Notice: Deaths KOSH, RUTH

body: The only road to Breezy Point, past the guards patrolling the entrance, runs straight toward the far western end of the Rockaway Peninsula in Queens. title: New Beach Land Poses Issue For a Gated Town in Queens

body: Dow Average Falls 41.64, But Smaller Stocks Climb Stocks ended mixed, as the shares of some overlooked smaller companies rose at the expense of larger blue-chip issues. The Dow Jones industrial average fell 41.64 points to 7,289.40, with one component, Procter & Gamble, falling 4 1/4, to 133 5/8, after Smith Barney downgraded the shares. But
